NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.description: Sorry, we can't find that page, please go to the home page to continue browsing!

hero.title: Build your online presence
hero.subtitle: with us your new project will become a reality

about.title: Connecting the Future: Our Story in the World of Technology.
about.body:
We are a team of web development experts dedicated to creating custom digital solutions that fit your needs, budget and technical knowledge. We specialize in delivering accessible and functional web applications, either developing sites from scratch or improving existing projects.

We take care of bringing your next online project to life, making sure every detail is aligned with your goals and vision.

services.title: what do we offer you?
services.subtitle: Services accessible to all our customers

static.title: Static Web Sites
static.body: Custom website development with static content, ideal for small projects that do not require frequent updates, such as landing pages, portfolios or catalogs. These sites offer speed, security and efficiency for stable content.

wordpress.title: Sitios WordPress
wordpress.body: Website development with WordPress, providing full control of the content without the need to touch code. Ideal for medium-sized projects such as blogs, portfolios or corporate sites, offering flexibility, scalability and easy customization.

web-apps.title: Web Applications
web-apps.body: Custom web application development with advanced functionalities, such as online payment integration, personalized recommendation systems, live chat, real-time data analysis and content management. Perfect for medium to large projects, such as online stores, educational platforms, online booking systems, news portals, and business management systems (ERP, CRM).

support.title: Consulting and Support
support.body: If you already have a project that you want to update, add new functionalities or correct errors, we take care of planning the whole process for you. From time estimation to budget creation, we offer you solutions in the technologies we know best, guaranteeing an efficient development according to your needs.

technologies.title: Our technologies
technologies.subtitle: We are experts in state-of-the-art web development technology

clients.title: Our Clients
clients.subtitle: Those who have placed their trust in us

tailor.name: Guillermo Saez
tailor.body: With Bachacode Developers I found what many entrepreneurs are looking for and never find: The peace of mind of being able to leave your business in the hands of people who take care of it and help it grow with solutions that border on excellence. They provide ideas and are 100% involved with each project.

mesgo.name: Luis Fernando Carbajal
mesgo.body: Thanks to Bachacode Developers we were able to meet the requirements established by CBI Group to obtain our supplier number. The website they developed not only exceeded our expectations, but also facilitated the process and the presentation of our company.

team.title: We guarantee
team.subtitle: What you will get by working with us

development.title: Agile development
development.body: With us, agile development means fast adaptation to your needs and constant results. We guarantee efficiency and precise adjustment to what you really need in your project.

communication.title: Communication
communication.body: In our approach, communication is fundamental. We keep channels open for constant and clear interaction with you. We listen to your needs and keep you informed at all times, ensuring that your vision is faithfully reflected in the final project.

prices.title: Adjustable prices
prices.body: We offer flexible pricing to fit your budget without compromising quality. We work together to find the best solution that fits your economic needs.

flexible.title: Flexible features
flexible.body: Our projects are distinguished by their flexibility, adjusting to your evolving needs. Each feature is customizable to ensure your full satisfaction, allowing you to modify the project according to your changing requirements throughout the development until it goes online.

cristhian.name: Cristhian Flores
cristhian.body: Experienced in developing interfaces and APIs with both frontend and backend knowledge.

josibel.name: Josibel Farias
josibel.body: Specializing in creating intuitive and engaging user experiences, with a focus on visual design and usability to ensure efficient and enjoyable interfaces.

useContactLocale.body: We believe in making possible any project our clients have in mind, are you interested in building your online presence?
